Articles.Content:
Oh...oh! I forgot everything about logs. 

I found some weird lines in logs but I don't know anything about what it means.

The game log below is what happens when I launch a Kerbal1 rocket.

Spoiler

[LOG 13:01:38.000] [EVE CloudsManager]: Disable clouds when camera: 18315.95 layer: 5500
[LOG 13:01:56.426] [EVE CloudsManager]: Enable clouds when camera: 15018.59 layer: 5500
[LOG 13:02:05.821] [EVE CloudsManager]: Disable clouds when camera: 15808.94 layer: 5500
[LOG 13:02:25.703] [EVE CloudsManager]: Enable clouds when camera: 15465.5 layer: 5500

[LOG 13:02:48.373] Prelaunch -> Ascend
[LOG 13:02:49.837] [MechJebModuleAscentAutopilot] LaunchStarted = 17077.6406253457

[LOG 13:03:02.188] #autoLOC_501174 Unloaded

[LOG 13:03:20.823] [EVE CloudsManager]: CloudsPQS: (EVE Clouds: Kerbin_Clouds_Main) OnSphereInactive

[LOG 13:03:20.824] [EVE CloudsManager]: Clouds2D is now SCALED

[LOG 13:03:47.152] Packing Kerbal 1 Debris for orbit

[LOG 13:03:48.183] [EVE CloudsManager]: Clouds2D is now MACRO
[LOG 13:03:49.057] Mechjeb Autostage: Executing next stage on mk1pod.v2
[LOG 13:03:49.470] [F: 58130]: Vessel Kerbal 1 Debris was on-rails at 20.9 kPa pressure and was destroyed.
[LOG 13:03:49.471] [Vessel Kerbal 1 Debris]: Vessel was destroyed.
[LOG 13:03:50.558] Mechjeb Autostage: Executing next stage on mk1pod.v2
[LOG 13:03:52.653] Kerbal 1 Debris Unloaded
[LOG 13:03:52.655] Packing Kerbal 1 Debris for orbit
[LOG 13:03:55.093] [F: 58466]: Vessel Kerbal 1 Debris was on-rails at 8.4 kPa pressure and was destroyed.
[LOG 13:03:55.094] [Vessel Kerbal 1 Debris]: Vessel was destroyed.
[LOG 13:04:24.139] [UIMasterController]: ShowUI
[LOG 13:04:24.139] Game Paused!
[LOG 13:04:24.141] [UIMasterController]: ShowUI

[LOG 13:06:22.347] [UIMasterController]: ShowUI
[LOG 13:06:22.347] Game Unpaused!
[LOG 13:06:26.389] [EVE CloudsManager]: CloudsPQS: (EVE Clouds: Kerbin_Clouds_Main) OnSphereInactive
[LOG 13:06:26.389] [EVE CloudsManager]: Clouds2D is now SCALED

[LOG 13:06:28.704] [EVE CloudsManager]: Clouds2D is now MACRO
[LOG 13:06:28.712] [EVE CloudsManager]: CloudsPQS: (EVE Clouds: Kerbin-Atmo) OnSphereActive
[LOG 13:06:28.712] [EVE CloudsManager]: Clouds2D is now MACRO[LOG 13:06:44.851] [UIMasterController]: ShowUI
[LOG 13:06:44.851] Game Paused!
[LOG 13:06:44.851] [UIMasterController]: ShowUI
[LOG 13:06:44.851] [FlightGlobals]: Active Vessel is in atmosphere. Cannot save.

p.s. I didn't install scatterer, as I said before. Thanks for bug-fixing.

EDIT: The times in the log may be interesting, because I guess we're not in the same time zone.

Edited March 30, 2020 by Harvey W.

Hello, you are experiencing what bug?  Is it the missing clouds and water bug as above?

Please reply here, I made a thread for my builds to reduce clutter on the OP authors:

What kind of config file is needed? I've had this installed before and it worked just fine. Not sure why it isn't working this time. I just put the stuff in game data folder as before. Not sure how to debug. I do have Outer Planets, Kopernicus, and Realistic Atmospheres installed if one of those might be interfering.

I'm on 1.8.1.2694 if that helps at all. Windows x64.

 

Edited March 30, 2020 by r3_141592654
Extra Info

@r3_141592654 For OPM I would suggest

SVE:

or OPM_VO:

both are not updated to 1.8x though so the best bet would be SVE but you will probably encounter some issus with scatterer as mentioned here.

14 hours ago, r3_141592654 said:

What kind of config file is needed? I've had this installed before and it worked just fine. Not sure why it isn't working this time. I just put the stuff in game data folder as before. Not sure how to debug. I do have Outer Planets, Kopernicus, and Realistic Atmospheres installed if one of those might be interfering.

I'm on 1.8.1.2694 if that helps at all. Windows x64.

I had the same problem. You only need one folder: BoulderCo.

On 2/22/2020 at 12:23 AM, Avera9eJoe said:

EVE works pretty well with 1.9. I've been running EVE with Spectra and haven't gotten so much as an error yet

I'm using Spectra right now. Spectra is doing very well! performance is great!

I know this isn't right place but; do you use scatterer? If yes, is it bugging? 

Edited April 2, 2020 by Yoloking Mapping

4 hours ago, Yoloking Mapping said:

I's using Spectra right now. Spectra is doing very well! performance is great!

I know this isn't right place but; do you use scatterer? If yes, is it bugging? BTW kopernicus is outdated mod

Thank you for the completent on Spectra!

I am using Scatterer right now, though not the official release. R-T-B released a patch for 1.9.1 in the meantime until it is officially updated and I've been running that. You can grab it here.

8 hours ago, Yoloking Mapping said:

I'm using Spectra right now. Spectra is doing very well! performance is great!

I know this isn't right place but; do you use scatterer? If yes, is it bugging? 

I'm actually using R-T-B's 1.9.1 build, and it works great! I've been experimenting with some other EVE packs, and I found that the sample BoulderCo config works even better for performance. 

Spoiler

Would be cool if spectra had city lights tbh.

On 4/1/2020 at 11:27 PM, Yoloking Mapping said:

I'm using Spectra right now. Spectra is doing very well! performance is great!

I know this isn't right place but; do you use scatterer? If yes, is it bugging? 

Hmm I would check that out but I would probably use a less resource intensive mod-pack  like Stock visual enhancements or boulder co. Even though my computer can handle it I just prefer SVE. Spectra is beautiful though  I love it 100% especially the Laythe clouds.

13 minutes ago, EdwardB3020﻿ said:

Hmm I would check that out but I would probably use a less resource intensive mod-pack  like Stock visual enhancements or boulder co. Even though my computer can handle it I just prefer SVE. Spectra is beautiful though  I love it 100% especially the Laythe clouds.

Y'know, I've actually started using BoulderCo, and my framerate is much better. I've never tried SVE, but maybe i'll check it out.

The glory of visual mods........... EVE, Spectra, Scatterer unofficial build, Planet Shine, Distant Objects Enhanced all on 1.9.1 in full glory.

 

And the rest can be found in this gallery: https://imgur.com/gallery/JgYZjK5 

These aren't even my favorite views, just the ones I wasn't drooling over to the point I forgot to screen shot it..............  this is 2k, running on windows 10 pro, 135 mods, 40-80 fps average during launch, i7-7700k 4.5 ghz boost, msi gaming x gtx1080 8gb, 16 gigs gskill ripjaw V ddr4, corsair 500gb sata ssd.

Is there a setting I can change to change what I'm getting?

in orbit, kerbin, 125000m up, outside view of ship I only "See" the shadows of clouds, except at the edges of my screen, which moves, meaning it's a rendering thing (to me anyhow, may be incorrect) 

It's like a cone/vield of view looking at the ship, if I move around I can tell where it ends, and then one sees the clouds and their shadows, not just the shadow layer.

Thx gang.

Post 1.9 seeing Kerbin displayed with white land textures in main menus.

 

In game appears fine...

 

Is the an EVE or Scatter issue with 1.9? 

 

Thanks!

I have seen this "bug" in some youtube videos
While I like the clouds on Eve, I find it annoying I can't see the surface. Is their a way to disable this effect entirely on Eve?
Dunno if it's gonna be compatible with 1.9.1 (I doubt it) but I'll test it in the future

6 hours ago, planet-creations said:

Dunno if it's gonna be compatible with 1.9.1 (I doubt it) but I'll test it in the future

It works just fine, I’m using the 1.8 build on 1.9.1.

1 hour ago, alberro+ said:

It works just fine, I’m using the 1.8 build on 1.9.1.

 

1.9  EVE,  I'm getting Land Textures on the water...  It's still blue but has a wavy land texture to it, when viewed from altitude and not a watery surface anymore? 

 

Also, the water is creeping up the sides of the shore and mountains...

 

Edited April 20, 2020 by Kilo60

On 3/10/2020 at 8:11 PM, razark said:

I'd suggest fully reading the first two posts on this page...

 

works now for me after using the things on my head called eyes

Hello people.
I enraged by these stupid graphics bug! (under spoiler)
Someone tell me how to deal with this. If possible.

Spoiler
Personally I'm not bugged by it. It still looks nice either way.

I am trying to reinstall EVE for the latest version of KSP but CKAN says it's not available? https://prnt.sc/s5y6fw

I just installed scatterer from CKAN but what else am I missing? I remember having both a long time ago.
I made a post earlier about it, it can be run using 1.9.1 just fine
Installed it manually. Running default scatterer, eve, and stock visual - seems to be doing okay I think. Just wanted some basic mods visuals
Cool!

Hello  i'm sorry if this has been asked before. But i'm an old returning player and I just installed 1.8.1 with RSS. The mod works great I get clouds I found in game that you have an option to disable city lights. But I also remember when I used to play I could remove the city textures with out breaking the mod and only keep the visual effects and clouds with out city lights or the city themselves. Can any 1 help me? if I recall you had to delete a .ddl file or a folder or something along these lines.
